snippet.title: Atari VCS/2600 commercial - Star Raiders "Watch Out Star Raider"
snippet.description: Star Raiders was programmed by Carla Meninsky with graphics by Jerome Domurat and is a simplified port of Doug Neubauer's classic Atari 400/800 computer game.  It was packaged in an over-sized box along with Vol. 3 of the Atari Force mini-comics and the Video Touch Pad controller.  When you start a game, or when a starbase is destroyed, the first 3 notes from the movie theme, "Close Encounters of the Third Kind" plays.
